title: Oval Water Pitcher, "Glasses with black and gold ornaments", 1913–14
provenance: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Blown glass pitcher with applied handle and black pen painting and gold decoration in the manner of the Steinschonau school of Northern Bohemia.

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Oval Water Pitcher, "Glasses with black and gold ornaments", 1913–14.
1913–14. Glass, enamel paint. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-86.
